body: @TrendBreaker Nah, in this she was already having sex with the senpai before MC mentioned NTR. At the end she says she was never interested in the MC and only cares about the senpai and never contacts MC again, she gets pregnant to the senpai and drops out of uni.

Lemme guess:  MC is the one who suggest FMC to try swinging or netorase in order to spice up their current sex life.  MC realizes that he made a grave mistake, but it's already too late as the experience will make it so she will never be satisfied with the MC ever again.  But she still says she still "Loves" ( depends on the MC to deal with her drama baggage and to support her financially and emotionally while she has fun ) MC in the end.  Sounds about right, yeah?
this feels a lot like ishimura's art for some reason
